thumb.title: NIPH - アナウンストレーラー
thumb.description: NIPH is a stylish roguelite platformer inspired by RPGs and roguelike games like Cave Story, Zelda, and Spelunky.NIPH will be released on PC next year, with a demo version scheduled for release at the end of October. Add your game to your wishlist on Steam, subscribe to this channel, and participate in game testing. The full game version features over 90 items, creatures, and 12 playable areas/biomes, each featuring two different bosses (selected randomly in each play).
